intro: Meet Rosabella, a young girl with a heart full of curiosity, who discovers that she is the only one who can restore the lost light to the kingdom where she lives.
description:
Embark on a magical adventure filled with color and friendship!

In a kingdom where magic flows through nature, colors have begun to fade. Rosabella, a brave young girl, must restore the light with the help of Magnolia, a wise magical creature, and Sunny, a bright little flower.

·Explore enchanted landscapes full of secrets.
·Meet charming and friendly characters
·Watch as Rosabella solves fun challenges and overcomes magical trials.
·Discover the power of friendship and bravery.
·Bring color back to the kingdom in this magical visual novel!
